bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of vomiting a clear and thin liquid, or of producing clear and thin liquid without vomiting. The former variant is also called ou tu qing shui 嘔吐清水 ; the latter is also called kou tu qing shui 口吐清水 . Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 18: 長蟲，蛔蟲也，長 一尺，動則吐清水 , “Longworms are identical with roundworms. They are 1 chi long. When they move [patients will] vomit clear water ”.
